vsParam:
This seems to be the mansion of Lord of Eruleum.
OK, let's get in. [px]!

Hmm, who are you?
You have an appointment with me on business?

Oh, sorry for this unexpected visit.
Are you Lord of Eruleum?

Yeah! Exactly, I'm Lord of Eruleum, Golden Rod!
Just call me Rod.

And you are?
You look like students and guardians...

Yes, we're students from the Academy.
We'll just come to the point, Lord Rod.

Could you please hand over
the "Alchemy of Water" skill book to us?

I see.
You know this book, which means... you're alchemists?

No, only [px] is an alchemist!
We're trying to make the "Pyroxene of Wisdom"!

I see. Such being the case...
I'd like to sell this skill book for 100 million Coles!

100 million!?
Th-that's out of the question!

Hmm, it's already lower than the going rate.
Let me see... Um, how about this?

You are [px], right?
I'll entrust you with multiple commissions.

And I'll reduce the price based on the work you'll
do for me. OK? Deal?

Hehehe, relax.
I'm always generous to good performers!

As you've agreed, let me think about what kind of work
I should give you. Thank you in advance! Hehehe!

100 million Coles...
Can we make so much money...

I'm not sure either...
But we have to give it a shot, [px]...
